channel.title: I cannot change anything!
channel.description: [b]Whenever i change something in client.java and save it... it makes no difference to my server at all... [/b] :( and this isnt with just the 1 client its the same with them all... for example... i cannot change what items a shop sells... i cannot change the fact that an npc says *owner = (someone who isnt me)* and yes i am changing the right things in client.java :P i even deleted all text in the file at one point to see what it did but made no difference what so ever and when i logged on the server run as normal... :eek: I can howether change player rights and stats and that is all i can change in the game... [b]does anyone know why this might be happening and how i can fix it?[/b] :confused:

item.title: I cannot change anything!

item.description:
@danso wrote:

Ok… so ive upgraded my jdk6.0 to jdk6u2 then i deleted it and now im downloading jdk6u1…
-.-’ sigh

item.title: I cannot change anything!
item.dc:creator: @yar_nova yar nova
item.description:
@yar_nova wrote:

You must uninstall the whole JDK, and install JDK6.0 again.

JDK6u2 does’nt work, you need JDK6.0 like i said, that’s the only reason it won’t compile.

item.dc:creator: @yar_nova yar nova

@yar_nova wrote:

item.title: I cannot change anything!
item.dc:creator: @danso danso
item.description:
@danso wrote:

[quote=“yar nova, post:6, topic:121529”]the default compiler does’nt work, you must fix it before you can compile.
Put this in a file for the best compiler\runserver and more:

:: ::
:: HyperCompile ::
:: Made by Yarnova. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
color 9B
:menu
title HyperCompile
cls
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: HyperCompile Ice ::
echo :: Made by Yarnova. ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo.
echo.
echo compile - Compile server.
echo serverdown - Takes down the server.
echo run - Run the server.
echo restart - All of the above, in order.
echo restart2 - All of the above, in order Without serverdown.
echo reboot - Serverdown and Run.
echo exit - Exit HyperCompile.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Access:
if %c%==compile goto compile
if %c%==run goto run
if %c%==serverdown goto serverdown
if %c%==exit goto exit
if %c%==restart goto restart
if %c%==restart2 goto restartv2
if %c%==reboot goto reboot
goto menu
:compile
cls
@echo off
title HyperCompile - Compile
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto menu
:restartv2
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title HyperCompile - Restart - Compile
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto restartv22
:restartv22
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(Done) ::
echo :: -Running the server- ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
exit
:restart
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title HyperCompile - Restart - Compile
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto restart2
:restart2
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(Done) ::
echo :: Taking down the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title HyperCompile - Restart - ServerDown
tskill java /a
goto restart3
:restart3
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(Done) ::
echo :: Taking down the server(Done) ::
echo :: -Running the server- ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
exit
:serverdown
cls
@echo off
cls
title HyperCompile - ServerDown
tskill java /a
pause
goto menu
:run
cls
@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
exit
:reboot
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Taking down the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
tskill java /a
goto reboot2
:reboot2
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Taking down the server(Done) ::
echo :: -Running the server- ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
exit[/code]

Or get JDK6.0 if you still can’t compile it.[/quote]

Ok i put it in a file i called “Compilerfix” now what? lol i tried to compile again but it does the same thing… [br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2007, 05:28:27 PM[/size][hr]Ill dl jdk6.0

Read full topic

Put this in a file for the best compiler\runserver and more:

cls

title HyperCompile - Compile
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

cls

echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(Done) ::
echo :: Taking down the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title HyperCompile - Restart - ServerDown
tskill java /a
goto restart3
:restart3
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(Done) ::
echo :: Taking down the server(Done) ::
echo :: -Running the server- ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
exit
:serverdown
cls
@echo off
cls
title HyperCompile - ServerDown
tskill java /a
pause
goto menu
:run
cls
@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
exit
:reboot
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Taking down the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
tskill java /a

cls

echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Whenever i change something in client.java and save it… it makes no difference to my server at all… and this isnt with just the 1 client its the same with them all… for example… i cannot change what items a shop sells… i cannot change the fact that an npc says owner = (someone who isnt me) and yes i am changing the right things in client.java i even deleted all text in the file at one point to see what it did but made no difference what so ever and when i logged on the server run as normal… :eek: I can howether change player rights and stats and that is all i can change in the game… does anyone know why this might be happening and how i can fix it?
